name: perl-date-exception

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description: Base exception package as Moo Role for Date::* packages.

dependencies.description:
Perl 5 is a highly capable, feature-rich programming language with over
27 years of development.

dependencies.description: Namespace::Autoclean - Keep imports out of your namespace

dependencies.name: perl-throwable
dependencies.description: A role for classes that can be thrown

dependent_to.name: perl-date-utils
dependent_to.description: Common date functions as Moo Role.
